features: Choose Right Hand or Left Hand from available Color options.
HAND ORIENTATION: A right handed bow will be held in your left hand and the string pulled with the right hand. Left handed bows are held in the right hand and pulled with the left hand.
HIGH-QUALITY - Hard wood rise. Strong fiberglass limb.Made of maple laminations

description: Question: Why the poundage of athletic recurve bow is only 18-36 pounds?

Athletic archery need to be stable.Every action should be consistent when drawing the bow.If the poundage is high, your action is easy to be out of contral, which will lead to mistake.There are 144 arrows in a game, shotting several rounds, high poundage will make people tired.
